titleStmt.title: Humours heau'n on earth with the ciuile warres of death and fortune. As also the triumph of death: or, the picture of the plague, according to the life; as it was in anno Domini. 1603. / By Iohn Dauies of Hereford.
titleStmt.author: Davies, John, 1565?-1618.

notesStmt.note: With two final leaves of dedicatory verses.
British Library copy identified as STC 6331 at reel 985:10.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 985:10) and Cambridge University Library (reel 1376:4).
